Returns: true if the event is consumed, else false
Parameters: MotionEvent: The motion event that occurred during the context click.
onContextClick(android.view.MotionEvent).Description: Notified when a context click occurs.

ClassDesc: The listener that is used to notify when a context click occurs. When listening for a context click ensure that you call @B_android#view#GestureDetector#onGenericMotionEvent_E@ in @B_android#view#View#onGenericMotionEvent_E@.
